title: Listen to Gugudan's 2nd mini album highlight medley! | allkpop.com
text:
Or Login / Register With Us Forgot Password? Remember Me Listen to Gugudan's 2nd mini album highlight medley! By beansss 2 minutes ago 195 5 0 0 SEE ALSO: Gugudan reveal tracklist for 'Act. 2 Narcissus' 
As previously revealed, the album contains 5 songs total, including a track VIXX 's Ravi participated in for his label hoobae group. The album overall seems to have a very bright and cheerful, happy mood, especially the title, " A Girl Like Me "! 
Gugudan's full album is set for February 28 at noon KST!
